author: USA TODAY, Adrianna Rodriguez, USA TODAY
title: Dr. Fauci says immunity certificates 'possible' after coronavirus pandemic. Here's what that means.
description: Experts argue documentation verifying a person is immune to the coronavirus could help reopen the economy by allowing some to safely return to work.
content:
A Los Angeles County test is looking for pivotal information about whether people can develop immunity that helps them fight off future infections.
USA TODAY
As the White House and state officials quarrel over authority to lift social distancing restriction… [+4572 chars]
